languages.text: {n}Арджента качает головой.{/n} "Здесь не обойтись без мудрого совета, которого не найдешь в этих стенах. Отец Иеронимус смог бы понять, что происходит на душе у Его Преосвященства — доверьте его друзианскому пастырю".

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента качает головой.{/n} "Здесь не обойтись без мудрого совета, которого не найдешь в этих стенах. Отец Иеронимус смог бы понять, что происходит на душе у Его Преосвященства — доверьте его друзианскому пастырю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise words of advice are required here, and they are not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand what goes on inside His Holiness's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise words of advice are required here, and they are not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand what goes on inside His Holiness's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of His Eminence's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of His Eminence's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

languages.text: {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Hier ist kluger Rat gefragt, aber den gibt es innerhalb dieser Mauern nicht. Reverend Hieronymus würde die Seele des Kardinals verstehen. Vertraut ihn dem guten Schäfer der Drusianer an."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Hier ist kluger Rat gefragt, aber den gibt es innerhalb dieser Mauern nicht. Reverend Hieronymus würde die Seele des Kardinals verstehen. Vertraut ihn dem guten Schäfer der Drusianer an."

{n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Hier ist kluger Rat gefragt, aber den gibt es innerhalb dieser Mauern nicht. Reverend Hieronymus würde die Seele Seiner Eminenz verstehen. Vertraut ihn dem guten Schäfer der Drusianer an."

languages.text: {n}Argenta secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous avez besoin de conseils avisés, et ce n'est pas entre ces murs que vous les trouverez. Le révérend Hiéronymus, lui, comprendrait les rouages qui animent l'âme du cardinal. Confiez-le donc au bon berger des Drusiens. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous avez besoin de conseils avisés, et ce n'est pas entre ces murs que vous les trouverez. Le révérend Hiéronymus, lui, comprendrait les rouages qui animent l'âme du cardinal. Confiez-le donc au bon berger des Drusiens. »

{n}Argenta secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous avez besoin de conseils avisés, et ce n'est pas entre ces murs que vous les trouverez. Le révérend Hiéronymus, lui, comprendrait les rouages qui animent l'âme de Son Éminence. Confiez-le donc au bon berger des Drusiens. »

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔摇了摇头。{/n}“这件事情需要明智的建议，而高墙之中是找不到的。希罗尼穆斯牧师应该能理解红衣主教灵魂中的痛苦，把他交给德鲁苏斯教派的虔诚信徒吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔摇了摇头。{/n}“这件事情需要明智的建议，而高墙之中是找不到的。希罗尼穆斯牧师应该能理解红衣主教灵魂中的痛苦，把他交给德鲁苏斯教派的虔诚信徒吧。”
{n}阿洁塔摇了摇头。{/n}“这件事情需要明智的建议，而高墙之中是找不到的。希罗尼穆斯牧师应该能理解主教大人灵魂中的痛苦，把他交给德鲁苏斯教派的虔诚信徒吧。”

languages.text: {n}Argenta niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Se necesita un consejo sabio, y no lo encontrará entre estas paredes. El reverendo Hieronymus comprendería el razonamiento del cardenal. Confíelo al buen pastor de los drusianos».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Se necesita un consejo sabio, y no lo encontrará entre estas paredes. El reverendo Hieronymus comprendería el razonamiento del cardenal. Confíelo al buen pastor de los drusianos».

{n}Argenta niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Se necesita un consejo sabio, y no lo encontrará entre estas paredes. El reverendo Hieronymus comprendería el razonamiento de Su Eminencia. Confíelo al buen pastor de los drusianos».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは首を振った。{/n}「ここでは賢明な助言が必要だが、それはこの壁の内側にはない。ヒエロニムス司祭は猊下の魂の働きを理解している。彼をドルシアンの良き羊飼いに託すがいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of His Eminence's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは首を振った。{/n}「ここでは賢明な助言が必要だが、それはこの壁の内側にはない。ヒエロニムス司祭は猊下の魂の働きを理解している。彼をドルシアンの良き羊飼いに託すがいい」

languages.text: {n}Argenta başını sallıyor.{/n} "Aklıselim birine danışmak gerek... O kişi de bu duvarlar arasında değildir. Kardinalin asıl niyetini ancak Muhterem Hieronymus bilebilir. Kendisi, Drususçuların muhterem önderine emanet edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Wise counsel is required here, and it is not to be found within these walls. Reverend Hieronymus would understand the workings of the cardinal's soul. Entrust him to the good shepherd of the Drusians."

{n}Argenta başını sallıyor.{/n} "Aklıselim birine danışmak gerek... O kişi de bu duvarlar arasında değildir. Sayın Kardinal'in asıl niyetini ancak Muhterem Hieronymus bilebilir. Kendisi, Drususçuların muhterem önderine emanet edilmelidir."
